text: Time is a precious resource; use it wisely.
author: Unknown

text: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The way we spend our time defines who we are.
author: Jonathan Estrin

text: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
author: William Penn

text: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
author: Pericles

text: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent.
author: Carl Sandburg

text: You will never find time for anything. If you want time, you must make it.
author: Charles Buxton

text: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

text: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

text: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to.'
author: Lao Tzu

text: Time is what prevents everything from happening at once.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

text: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

text: Time is free, but it's priceless. You can't own it, but you can use it. You can't keep it, but you can spend it.
author: Harvey Mackay

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson
